Half-Marathon Training Program

Notes

  • Daily numbers are listed in miles.
  • All run distances include a 1M warmup and 1M cooldown at jog pace.
  • Daily runs should be performed at 75-80% effort (not too hard, not too easy - able to carry on a conversation)
  • XT = Cross-training (swimming, biking, or any other elevated heart rate, non-impact activity)
